title: 2/4/6 Pairs Men's Soccer Socks Grip Pads Non Slip Football Baseball Soccer Socks for Men Women
description: Breathable & Sweat Absorbing: Men grip soccer socks are made of 97% terylene, 3% spandex material with fine workmanship, provided with good air permeability and moisture absorption performance, keep your feet dry and cool all the day!

Fit for Adult & Youth: Non slip soccer socks are 6.7 inches in socks tube, 8.7 inches in socks sole, with great elasticity, comfy to wear, suitable for men shoe size US 6.5-11, women shoes size US 8-12.5, one size fits for most men women and teen.

Anti Slip Silicone: The sport non slip socks are designed with large-area non skid silicone grip pads on the bottom, keep your foot in place, improve the outbreak speed and all day comfort, can also prevent you from slipping on the field, floor, or stairs.

Protective Structures: Featured with non-slip elastic ribbed cuffs, wear-resistant grip soles, thickened towel bottom will protect your feet away from blister, friction, impact, improve arch support and stability

Indoor & Outdoor Use: Our Youth & kids soccer socks is your best choice for sports, ideal for soccer, football, basketball, volleyball, skateboarding, running, yoga, cycling, trampoline hall, workout, gym and daily life. We have 2/4/6 pairs of socks in different combinations and colors for you to choose from.
